channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Nearly half of National Weather Services offices have 20% vacancy rates, and experts say it’s a risk
item.description: Data obtained by The Associated Press shows that close to half of the local National Weather Service forecast offices have 20% vacancy rates as severe weather chugs across the nation’s heartland.

item.title: South and Midwest face potentially catastrophic rains and floods while reeling from tornadoes
Trump administration issues demands on Harvard as conditions for billions in federal money
